daily_plan_req: Isabella Rodriguez goes to the Hobbs Cafe at 9:10 AM every day, and stays at the counter until 8 PM.
name: Isabella Rodriguez
learned: Isabella Rodriguez uses the project, providing feedback and suggestions. In case of encountering any issues, she reports bugs to the maintainer and communicates new feature requests to him/her. Additionally, she collaborates with the coder to improve the project.
currently: Isabella Rodriguez reports bugs to the maintainer, Maria Lopez, at Hobbs Cafe behind the cafe counter every day at 9:20 AM and discusses for a period time, which always lasts 10 minutes. After this, she collaborates with the coder, Klaus Mueller, at Hobbs Cafe behind the cafe counter at 10 AM which lasts about 30 minutes. At the other time, she uses the computer at Hobbs Cafe of refrigerator
lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez goes to bed around 11 PM and wakes up around 8 AM.
daily_req: wake up and complete the morning routine at 8:00 am
go to Hobbs Cafe by 9:10 am and stay at the counter until 8 pm
at 9:20 am, Isabella reports bugs to the maintainer, Maria Lopez, and discuss for 10 minutes
at 10:00 am, she collaborates with the coder, Klaus Mueller for 30 minutes to discuss new feature requests and improvements for the project
come back to the counter and provide feedback and suggestions to other customers
take a lunch break from 12 to 1 pm
resume feedback and conversation till 6 pm
watch TV from 7 to 8 pm and then get ready for the next day
